message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hey Alice, $100 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $90 right now.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $110 for the product.
Alice,  $110 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go to $95.  That's a fair price for both of us, and I really want to get this product.  Let's close the deal.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more than $95. How about $105?
